summary.span: 提供屬性索引標籤的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for property tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底類別行為的屬性索引標籤。屬性索引標籤會顯示的工具列上控制項的 [屬性] 視窗中，並允許元件，以顯示其屬性或其他資料的不同檢視。The class provides the base class behavior for a property tab. Property tabs are displayed on the toolbar of the control of the Properties window, and allow a component to display different views of its properties or other data. 使用者程式碼將通常不會建立的執行個體直接。User code will usually not create an instance of a directly. 相反地，表示 [屬性] 索引標籤型別或屬性顯示的元件可以是與屬性相關聯的索引標籤或型別應該顯示。Instead, a that indicates the type of the property tab or property tabs to display for a component can be associated with the properties or types that the should be displayed for. 會具現化所指定型別的被瀏覽元件的型別或屬性欄位相關聯。The will instantiate a of the type specified by a associated with the type or property field of the component that is being browsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供範例其中列出任何元件，依類型名稱來排列屬性。The following code example provides an example that lists any properties on a component, arranged by type name. [!code-cpp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 釋放 使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
